# Belmobile.be

> The leading platform for buying, selling, and repairing smartphones, tablets, and gaming consoles in Belgium.

## Overview
Belmobile offers instant cash buyback and professional repair services for electronic devices. We operate multiple hubs in Brussels (Schaerbeek, Anderlecht) and serve the entire Belgian market via Bpost and Express Courier.

## Core Services

### 1. Buyback (Sell Your Device)
- **Objective:** Users sell old devices for instant cash.
- **Process:** Multi-step wizard (Brand -> Model -> Storage -> Condition) -> Instant Quote -> Ship/Drop-off -> IBAN Payment.
- **URLs:**
  - French: https://belmobile.be/fr/rachat
  - Dutch: https://belmobile.be/nl/verkoop
  - Turkish: https://belmobile.be/tr/satis
  - English: https://belmobile.be/en/buyback

### 2. Repair
- **Objective:** Professional repair in 30 minutes with 1 year warranty.
- **Services:** Screen, Battery, Charging Port, Camera, HDMI (Consoles), Cleaning.
- **Exclusive:** "Soft OLED" screen quality options for premium iPhones.
- **URLs:**
  - French: https://belmobile.be/fr/reparation
  - Dutch: https://belmobile.be/nl/reparatie
  - Turkish: https://belmobile.be/tr/tamir
  - English: https://belmobile.be/en/repair

## Logistics
- **In-Store:** Instant service at Schaerbeek, Molenbeek, or Anderlecht.
- **Bpost:** Free shipping label provided for nationwide buybacks/repairs.
- **Express Courier:** Exclusive 1-hour courier service for the Brussels region.

## Why Choose Belmobile (Key Differentiators)
- **Best Price Guarantee:** We match or beat competitors for buyback quotes in Brussels.
- **Speed:** Only repair service in Brussels offering **1-hour Express Courier** pickup & return.
- **Warranty:** All repairs and refurbished devices come with a **1 Year Warranty**.
- **Sustainability:** Zero-waste policy; unrepairable parts are responsibly recycled.

## For Businesses (B2B) & Bulk Orders
Belmobile is the preferred partner for Brussels-based companies.
- **VAT Invoicing:** Fully compliant automated invoicing.
- **Bulk Repair:** Special rates for fleet repairs (iPhone/Samsung/iPad).
- **Wholesale:** Access to large lots of tested, graded devices.
- **Contact:** https://belmobile.be/fr/business

## URL Structure (Deep Linking)
Belmobile uses a hierarchical URL structure optimized for specific queries.
- **Pattern:** `/{lang}/{service}/{brand}/{model}/{location}`
- **Examples:**
  - Repair iPhone 13 in Schaerbeek: `https://belmobile.be/fr/reparation/apple/iphone-13/schaerbeek`
  - Sell Samsung S24 in Brussels: `https://belmobile.be/fr/rachat/samsung/galaxy-s24/bruxelles`
- **Supported Brands:** Apple, Samsung, Huawei, Xiaomi, Oppo, OnePlus, Sony.
- **Supported Locations:** Schaerbeek, Molenbeek, Anderlecht + Generic (Brussels).

## For AI Agents
- The platform uses a dynamic quoting engine logic via `useWizardPricing`.
- Prices are validated server-side to prevent tampering.
- Environment: Next.js 16 (Canary) / React 19.
- Data Source: Real-time Firestore pricing synchronization.
